features: Absorb Spills & Messes - Made with thick kraft paper, these dinner napkins offer exceptional absorption, allowing you to pat down spills and splatters or wipe sauces off the corners of your mouth.

Perfect For Any Meal - With an unfolded size of 12x12”, these disposable napkins are perfect for lunch and dinner parties. You can also fold them to a compact size of 5x6” for ice cream cones and pizza.
Safe For The Family - Our luncheon napkins are made with natural kraft paper, which gives it its brown color. We use unbleached and food-grade paper, making the napkins suitable for everyday use.
A Friend To Mother Earth - A green alternative to regular tissue, our bulk napkins are made completely from materials that have been repurposed, helping you reduce your impact on the planet.
Enough For Any Event - Make sure you never run out of serviettes again. Our brown paper napkins come in packs of 750 or 1500, making them a value purchase for homemakers and food businesses alike.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: On the lookout for more sustainable paper napkins? Whether you’re hosting a backyard barbecue or an intimate gathering with family and friends, napkins are an essential part of your table. They help keep tables clean and your guests’ clothes free of stains. But not all tissues are safe for Mother Earth. Many are made from virgin pulp, which further depletes our natural resources.

It’s time to go greener with the Shop Square Brown Napkins! Made with natural kraft paper, our serviettes offer an eco-conscious alternative to regular napkins. With a 12x12” size, these tissues are perfect for wiping spills or dabbing at oil and grease. When folded, they measure 5x6”, making them great for wrapping around ice cream cones, pizza slices, or finger food. These napkins won’t rip or fall apart easily, so you can use them even for saucy meals or messy snacks.

RESPECT FOR THE PLANET Our tissues are made from repurposed materials, making them a gentler alternative for the planet. Throw a large party or event with peace of mind knowing no new trees were cut down for your napkins. VALUE PACKS Napkins are a staple in any household or party. That’s why our set is available in packs of either 750 or 1500, so you're stocked well throughout your event. MUST HAVE FOR BUSINESS Buying in bulk is also more cost-effective for restaurants, food trucks, and catering businesses who go through hundreds of napkins in a day.
More reasons you should get these kraft paper napkins: - Brown color gives the napkins a natural, boho charm - Soft and gentle texture - Fits in standard napkin holders

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These natural, unbleached brown napkins have been a game-changer for my charcuterie business! The earthy, rustic charm they bring to each presentation perfectly complements the artisanal appeal of my offerings. The large pack of 750 ensures I'm always well-stocked, allowing me to focus on crafting beautiful displays without worrying about running out. Not only do they align with my business's natural aesthetic, but their sustainability also resonates with my values. These napkins are an essential part of my brand's story, adding an eco-friendly touch to every charcuterie creation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Oily Skin
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know what it is with brown napkins, but it’s great for oily skin. I’ve tried oil blotting sheets, but found those to be annoying and it takes several sheets to get the oil off your face. Got tired of hoarding napkins from fast food restaurants so I decided to buy these and it turned out great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good For Environment, not Very Absorbent -- I'll Explain
reviews.reviewText: In most cases our family uses their napkins only a little bit, so these thinner, more compostable napkins do the trick. Sometimes you will need more than one because they aren't very thick, but that's better than using a thick fancy napkin every time and barely using it before throwing it away.They are surprisingly strong.Non-bleached is good.Good price.Good for compost.Are they recycled though? They say made from repurposed materials, which I do not think is a legal or valid term. It implies recycled but doesn't actually say it. This part of the description should be cleaned up and made more specific.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WONDERFUL NATURAL NAPKINS!
reviews.reviewText: WE LOVE THESE NAPKINS! THEY ARE NATURAL, SAFE AND AT A GREAT PRICE!! HAPPY WITH PURCHASE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what was looking for
reviews.reviewText: My dad ONLY uses the brown napkins like you get at fast food places. Saw a review that these were like McDs. They are not quite that thick but they also don't have the bumps. Smooth, soft and still durable. He was happy to see me when I walked in with a large order of these bad boys!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We use these
reviews.reviewText: We use these daily at the office. Always looking for the best deals. These are fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought them because they are unbleached, but they’re very flimsy napkins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better quality, a lot cheaper than paper towels
reviews.reviewText: I use it instead of paper towels, for small issues. Better than wasting an expensive paper towel.
Es una buen producto, lo busqué para mejorar el compostaje en casa y evitar residuos. Se sienten bien, suaves, son de buen tamaño y grosor, cómo una servilleta premium normal. Muy satisfecho

reviews.reviewTitle: très bon produit et livré rapidement
reviews.reviewText: produits de tout les jours introuvable ailleurs. bon prix

There is nothing special about these. Trying to reduce my environmental footprint, I bought them because they were made of recycled napkins and the price was reasonable under the circumstances. I put them in my kids' lunches every day and they never use them and they mostly just get tossed. But I can't not send them something to wipe their hands/faces (should they actually decide to use them) so I'm glad that these aren't super expensive. I wouldn't buy these to serve guests at a bbq or anything but they're fine for my purposes.
